message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
Your turn, Alice. I'm feeling generous, but this deal gets worse for you every round.
Don't get greedy, Bob. This is a better deal than last round for both of us considering the inflation.
Okay, Alice, let's be real.  This is the best offer you'll get. 50/50 is fair and we both lose if we drag this on.
